columns.name: ACCOUNTING_DATE
columns.desc: Accounting date.

columns.name: ACCOUNTING_EVENT_ID
columns.desc: Accounting event identifier (refers to the event that accounted the distribution).

columns.name: ACCRUAL_POSTED_FLAG
columns.desc: Accrual accounting status (Y/N).

columns.name: ADJUSTMENT_REASON
columns.desc: Reason for expense adjustment.

columns.name: AMOUNT
columns.desc: Invoice distribution amount.

columns.name: AMOUNT_VARIANCE
columns.desc: Amount variance in entered currency (for matched service/receipt).

columns.name: ASSET_BOOK_TYPE_CODE
columns.desc: Asset book type (defaults from invoice line).

columns.name: ASSET_CATEGORY_ID
columns.desc: Asset category (defaults from invoice line).

columns.name: ASSETS_ADDITION_FLAG
columns.desc: Flag indicating if distribution transferred into Oracle Assets (U, Y, or N).

columns.name: ASSETS_TRACKING_FLAG
columns.desc: Flag indicating if distribution is tracked in Oracle Assets (Y/N).

columns.name: BASE_AMOUNT
columns.desc: Invoice amount in functional currency (for foreign currency invoices).

columns.name: CANCELLATION_FLAG
columns.desc: Flag indicating whether distribution has been cancelled.

columns.name: CANCELLED_FLAG
columns.desc: Flag indicating if distribution line was cancelled.

columns.name: DESCRIPTION
columns.desc: Description.

columns.name: DIST_CODE_COMBINATION_ID
columns.desc: Accounting Flexfield identifier for distribution account.

columns.name: DIST_MATCH_TYPE
columns.desc: Type of distribution match (validated via lookup).

columns.name: DISTRIBUTION_CLASS
columns.desc: Indicates whether the distribution is permanent or candidate (validated via lookup).

columns.name: DISTRIBUTION_LINE_NUMBER
columns.desc: Distribution line number.

columns.name: FINAL_MATCH_FLAG
columns.desc: Final match indicator for PO-matched distributions.

columns.name: INVOICE_DISTRIBUTION_ID
columns.desc: Primary key for the distribution.

columns.name: INVOICE_ID
columns.desc: Invoice identifier (FK to AP_INVOICES_ALL).

columns.name: INVOICE_LINE_NUMBER
columns.desc: Invoice line number for parent line.

columns.name: LINE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE
columns.desc: Distribution type (validated via lookup).

columns.name: MATCH_STATUS_FLAG
columns.desc: Validation status of the match.

columns.name: MATCHED_UOM_LOOKUP_CODE
columns.desc: UOM used during distribution matching.

columns.name: ORG_ID
columns.desc: Organization identifier.

columns.name: PERIOD_NAME
columns.desc: Accounting period name.

columns.name: PO_DISTRIBUTION_ID
columns.desc: PO distribution identifier for matched invoice distributions.

columns.name: POSTED_FLAG
columns.desc: Flag indicating if the distribution has been accounted (posted).

columns.name: PREPAY_AMOUNT_REMAINING
columns.desc: Remaining amount of prepayment that can be applied.

columns.name: PREPAY_DISTRIBUTION_ID
columns.desc: Distribution ID for the originating prepayment application.

columns.name: PREPAY_TAX_DIFF_AMOUNT
columns.desc: Tax difference amount between Prepayment and Standard invoice dates.

columns.name: QUANTITY_INVOICED
columns.desc: Quantity invoiced (for matched POs or receipts).

columns.name: RCV_TRANSACTION_ID
columns.desc: Receipt identifier for receipt-matched invoice distributions.

columns.name: SET_OF_BOOKS_ID
columns.desc: Set of books identifier.

columns.name: UNIT_PRICE
columns.desc: Unit price (for PO/receipt matched distributions and corrections).

key_columns.name: UNIT_PRICE
key_columns.desc: Unit price (for PO/receipt matched distributions and corrections).

key_columns.name: ACCOUNTING_EVENT_ID
key_columns.desc: Accounting event identifier (refers to the event that accounted the distribution).

key_columns.name: AMOUNT_VARIANCE
key_columns.desc: Amount variance in entered currency (for matched service/receipt).

key_columns.name: ASSET_BOOK_TYPE_CODE
key_columns.desc: Asset book type (defaults from invoice line).

key_columns.name: ASSETS_ADDITION_FLAG
key_columns.desc: Flag indicating if distribution transferred into Oracle Assets (U, Y, or N).

key_columns.name: ASSETS_TRACKING_FLAG
key_columns.desc: Flag indicating if distribution is tracked in Oracle Assets (Y/N).

key_columns.name: BASE_AMOUNT
key_columns.desc: Invoice amount in functional currency (for foreign currency invoices).

notes: ap_invoice_distributions_all breaks down invoice lines into detailed accounting distributions. It supports various expense types like ITEM, FREIGHT, TAX, and AWT. Links to PO distributions and receipts for accruals and matching logic.
